import React , {useRef, useState} from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import "./contact.css" import contact from "../../img/contact.png" import mail from "../../img/mail.svg" import add from "../../img/add.png" function Contact() { const formRef = useRef() const [done, setDone] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_1erjpft', 'template_gvri34m', formRef.current, 'z3-KJAunrIV-5-vB8') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); setDone(true); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } return (
